HCI Project Portfolio

HKUST COMP4461 Human Computer Interaction

WELCOME TO MY PORTFOLIO

By Lam Yeung Kong Sunny

My name is Sunny Lam

I am a student from the Hong Kong Unversity of Science and Technolohy and currently majoring in Computer Science and minoring in Big Data Technology. This webpage is created to record all of the context, milestones and reflections from all the HCI projects that me and my group have been working on.

Project 1 - Make the campus more friendly for visiting students from the animal kingdom Project 2 - HRI for Hospitality Project 3 - (Social) XR for “Local Community” (To be implement)
